name: Dr.N.Abdul Azees
description: Dr. N. Abdul Azees, M.D, Siddha (Pharmacology) has more than a decade of clinical experience. He is also an expert of Varmam, an ancient art of acupressure from South India. Dr. Azees uses his deep knowledge of herbs to help his patients, including women suffering from hormonal imbalances and PCOD. He has selected the multi-herb formulas being used in the Sepalika 5-Petal PCOD program with great care, to ensure best results and no side effects.
